cartoons.title: The Lion King
cartoons.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

cartoons.title: Aladdin
cartoons.description: A kind-hearted street urchin finds a magic lamp containing a genie who grants him three wishes.

cartoons.title: Spirited Away
cartoons.description: A young girl gets trapped in a mysterious spirit world and must work to free herself and her parents.

cartoons.title: My Neighbor Totoro
cartoons.description: Two sisters encounter friendly forest spirits in postwar rural Japan.

cartoons.title: Adventure Time
cartoons.description: Finn and Jake explore the post-apocalyptic Land of Ooo, encountering strange creatures and foes.

cartoons.title: The Powerpuff Girls
cartoons.description: Three superpowered little girls fight crime and save their city from villains.

cartoons.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
cartoons.description: A cheerful sea sponge lives in a pineapple under the sea and works at the Krusty Krab.

cartoons.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
cartoons.description: A young boy must master the four elements to save the world from the Fire Nation.
